Package controller.users

This package represents controller classes dealing with objects and operations related to managing students.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddStudentController
    Class AddStudentController represents the interaction between the add student dialog and the various methods needed in the model package.
    AddStudentCourseController
    This class represents the communication between the add student course dialog and the actual Student object.
    AddTeacherAssistantController
    This class represents the interaction between the add teacher assistant dialog and the various methods needed in the model package
    DeleteStudentListController
    This class represents the interaction between the delete student list dialog and the deletion of students from a SpreadsheetCourse.
    EditStudentListController
    This class represents the interaction between the Edit Student list dialog and the list of students contained in a SpreadsheetCourse.

Package controller.users Description

This package represents controller classes dealing with objects and operations related to managing students. See Section 2.3 of the requirements specification. The controller classes serve as a way for the model classes to communicate with the view classes
